item.title: Getting Started with Hugo Static Site Generation
item.description: Getting Started with Hugo Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. It’s built with Go and is known for its speed and flexibility. Why Choose Hugo? Speed - Hugo is incredibly fast, building most sites in under a second Flexibility - Supports multiple content formats and themes No Dependencies - Single binary with no external dependencies Key Features Lightning-fast build times Powerful theming system Built-in server for development Multilingual support Custom output formats Getting Started To create a new Hugo site:
